subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Beckham made a surprising start in his A.C. Milan debut Sunday, playing 89 minutes in a solid if not outstanding performance at A.S. Roma. Beckham, wearing No. 32, was replaced by Mathieu Flamini in the 89th minute with the game tied at 2-2, the final score. His exit was met mostly with boos from the Roma crowd. Beckham joined Milan on a two-month loan from the Los Angeles Galaxy of M.L.S., hoping to stay sharp so he can earn a spot on the English national team.
